name: over-syncerr
description: Overr-Syncerr is a self-hosted automation tool for syncing Plex media libraries by matching and updating content metadata and watched status across instances.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Keep multiple Plex servers in sync by copying library structure and content organization

features.title: Watched Status Sync
features.description: Transfer viewing progress and watched markers between Plex instances for consistent experience

features.title: Selective Sync
features.description: Choose specific libraries or content types to synchronize while excluding others

features.title: Dry Run Mode
features.description: Preview sync operations before executing to verify changes and prevent unintended modifications
